post_title: Looking for - Chance yellow Blank Back and other backs
post_content:
Trying to track down this card, last time it publicly sold was Goodwin in 2016.

Also looking for Chance AB, Cycles, Lenox, Hindu and Carolina Brights. 

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/MYCX7zL.jpg[/IMG]
Bump, still looking for this card if you know where it might be hoping to get better scans of it.  Thanks!

I like the dedication Chris, they will come along, just keep plugging 

GL
